name: Sprout Clients – CRM and Lead Management
author: Sprout Apps

sections.description:
Sprout Apps Family
Sprout Clients is a standalone Lead Management plugin and is complimentary to Sprout Invoices, another free business centric plugin from Sprout Apps.

Sprout Clients – Premium WordPress CRM & Lead Management Plugin

The future of Sprout Clients relies on happy customers supporting Sprout Invoices by purchasing upgraded versions. If you like this free version of Sprout Clients please consider purchasing an upgrade.

Create Leads, Sprout Clients

Properly leveraging your contact lists isn’t sending out a single email to the entire list asking for work — instead you need to build business relationships. Managing contacts and customers shouldn’t be a burden, and Sprout Clients wants to make the that entire process easier and less time consuming.

Scheduled Messaging

Write to your leads/clients now and have them delivered later. Meet someone new and want to follow-up in a couple weeks, now there’s no forgetting. Version 2.0

Engagements

Sometimes you meet your clients or create specific engagements. Sprout Clients wants to tie those engagements to your clients for reference and automation. Version 2.0

Relationship Building

The premise of “managing” your contacts is to build relationships. Sprout Clients wants to make the process of building those relationships easier and less time consuming.

Sprout App Integrations with Sprout Invoices

Regardless of this being a standalone app the integration compliments Sprout Invoices very well. Future integrations with Help Scout Desk, and more are planned.

Built the WordPress Way

Plenty of filters and actions allow you to hook into Sprout Clients and alter whatever you’d like or build some awesome features beyond what we have planed for the future.

Awesome Support

The results of our happiness report show people love our support, check it out on the Sprout Invoices page — we strive for happy!

Make sure to review the Sprout Clients features page for more detailed information. As well as the full featured demo.

Support

Priority support is provided with an upgraded version. All free support will provided in the forums.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
=3.2=
* Update: Updated Freemius SDK

3.1

  • Fix: Bad Activation Link
  • Fix: .live updates to Java

2.2

  • Compat update

2.1.9

  • Update: Resolve an issue with the latest version of WordPress tax queries.

2.1.7

  • Update: Collision prevention

2.1.6

  • FIX: Jetpack compat issue.

2.1.4

  • FIX: Select2 Compat issues with themes and other plugins

2.1.3

  • FIX: ACF Compat issues
  • Update: Compat class

2.0.4

  • FIX: Compat issues

2.0

  • NEW: Engagements (paid version)
  • NEW: Messages (paid version)
  • NEW: Improved categorization
  • NEW: Free version
sections.screenshots:
1. Easy to use admin page that any WordPress user is familiar with. Modular meta boxes allows you to set your preferred layout. Need more meta? ACF is fully supported.

  2. All types and status are filterable, even in combination with each other. Support for Advanced Posts Manager allows for saved more advanced functionality.

  3. Updating statues of your leads needs to be easy, future automation is going to help tremendously, otherwise a couple clicks with AJAX saving is speedy.
sections.reviews:
It works perfectly.

By KevinHeath on October 19, 2023

I tried a couple of other CRM/invoicing which lacked features or had too many bugs. I'm glad I found this plugin. It simply works, and it works very well.

best crm and invoice

By 85oo85 on January 10, 2018

Sprout is the best plugin I've found so far for my clients and myself. It is flexible and intuitive to use. Simply great!

Great plugin to simplify all estimate/billing issues

By egrange on September 18, 2017

I like Sprout because it really helps me to be more efficient, more professional, and more secure. It's a win-win situation for my business and my clients'.

Simple and Awesome

By sharkjacob on September 3, 2016

What more to say. Nothing beat that simple and efficient plugin! A no brainer decision!!!

Awesome Business Solutions

By jwdesignlv on September 3, 2016

I have been searching forever for a system that does everything I wanted it to, but nothing has worked out. Until now! Sprout Apps in fantastic, and paired with projectpanorama and approveme it's exactly what I wanted! Also, their support is AMAZING!

Small Business Life Saver!

By green0nks on September 3, 2016

I run a company that is just getting started. We started using Sprout Invoices a while back to streamline our workflow. I have been keeping my eye on Sprout Clients ever since as the Invoices app was done so well. As soon as the free version was available, I jumped on the change to give it a try and I am not disappointed! It integrates so well with Sprout Invoices which we were already using and with Panorama Projects which is something else we were already using. This was the much needed missing piece to our CRM workflow!

A 5-Star Review from the Developer

By Dan Cameron (dancameron) on September 3, 2016

Sprout Clients is something that I've personally spent a lot of time on building and I really hope it helps out those small businesses and freelancers keep in touch with their clients, leads, and conference friends. Organization is one thing but not forgetting to send out that follow-up email is the best.
